allow: Bash(node -e 'const fs = require\(""fs""\); const html = fs.readFileSync\(""modules/16_complexity_theory.html"", ""utf8""\); const topicCount = \(html.match\(/topic:/g\) || []\).length; const relCards = \(html.match\(/class=""relation-card/g\) || []\).length; const whatIfs = \(html.match\(/class=""what-if-card""/g\) || []\).length; const glossaryTerms = \(html.match\(/{ term:/g\) || []\).length; const circuitEntries = \(html.match\(/id: '"''"'\(deutsch|bv|shor|qpe\)'"''"'/g\) || []\).length; console.log\(""Quiz questions:"", topicCount\); console.log\(""Relation cards:"", relCards\); console.log\(""What-if cards:"", whatIfs\); console.log\(""Glossary terms:"", glossaryTerms\); console.log\(""Circuit entries:"", circuitEntries\);')

Bash(node -e 'const fs = require\(""fs""\); const html = fs.readFileSync\(""modules/16_complexity_theory.html"", ""utf8""\); const circuits = html.match\(/id: '"''"'\\w+'"''"',\\n\\s+name:/g\); console.log\(""Circuits:"", circuits ? circuits.length : 0\); const relHTML = \(html.match\(/data-rel=""/g\) || []\).length; console.log\(""Relation cards \(data-rel\):"", relHTML\); const glossaryEntries = \(html.match\(/\\{ term: '"''"'/g\) || []\).length; console.log\(""Glossary entries:"", glossaryEntries\);')
